original_text: So David did as God had commanded him to do. His men chased the Philistine army all the way from Gibeon to Gezer.
korean_text: 이에 다윗이 하나님의 명령대로 행하여 블레셋 사람들의 군대를 쳐서 기브온에서부터 게셀까지 이르렀더니

sentences.original_text: So David did as God had commanded him to do.
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 다윗은 하나님이 명령하신 대로 행했습니다.

sentences.original_text: His men chased the Philistine army
all the way from Gibeon to Gezer.
